dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Violation]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 22, 2005 12:08 PM
To: BrianXdotcom@aol.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Violation]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of Copyright Violation
Date: Tue, 21 Jun 2005 08:32:58 EDT
From: BrianXdotcom@aol.com
To: abuse@servermatrix.com
CC: BrianXdotcom@aol.com, cpower@starband.net

Hello,

SERVERMATRIX.COM is hosting a website that contains copyright violations.
Now that you are aware of the issue, you are jointly responsible for the
copyright violation and for any legal action the may follow.

The website in question is www.collectiveeffect.com. This site contains
information taken from www.brianx.com without authorization.
Specifically, the text
 information found on page
http://www.collectiveeffect.com/nightclub-etiquette.html was taken and
slightly modified from http://brianx.com/br2cnightclubetiquette.html

That article has been online on www.brianx.com since 2001. The material on
the site is copyrighted and is not available for unauthorized reproduction.
If necessary, I can also provide additional data that will establish the
authorship and date of creation of the material in question.

According to the registration information, your offending site is registered
as follows:

Charles Power cpower@starband.net
po box 2789
Woodinville, WA 98072
US
Phone: 01206-660-3865

Domain servers:
   NS1.SERVERMATRIX.COM          216.185.111.10
   NS2.SERVERMATRIX.COM          69.56.222.10

A CEASE & DESIST letter to the email above has been ignored. Please remove
this copyrighted information from your server.

Thank you,
Brian


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCuZr2vK/XpJs6oyURAtNqAKCqUqCoU0P9nSOmOf8yEK2kwoIFDACgm1hI
48vcfRg4InXv1Cy+lP29ozE=
=fRG1
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
